name: UMeterAnalyzer
doc:
UMeterAnalyzer

UMeterAnalyzer calculates the current amplitude of an
audio bus in real-time.

Settings: The settings for the meter audio analyzer.
OnOverallMeterResults: Delegate to receive all overall meter results since last delegate call.
OnPerChannelMeterResults: Delegate to receive all meter results, per-channel, since last delegate call.
OnLatestOverallMeterResults: Delegate to receive the latest overall meter results.
OnLatestPerChannelMeterResults: Delegate to receive the latest per-channel meter results.
